text: deployment-stable.yaml deployment-canary.yaml YAML YAML labels: labels: app: web app: web replicaCount: {{ .Values.stableRC }} replicaCount: {{ .Values.canaryRC }} image: # get stable image name and tag image: # get canary image name and tag helm upgrade --install myrelease --set stableRC=9 --set canaryRC=1 --set stablelmage.tag=1.0.0 --set canarylmage.tag=v2.0.0 myrepo/mychart
